statements: SELECT * FROM ProviderInformation;
SELECT provider_name, industry_standard_rating FROM ProviderInformation;
SELECT provider_name, location FROM ProviderInformation WHERE industry_standard_rating > 4.0;
SELECT * FROM ProviderInformation ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT provider_id, contact_information FROM ProviderInformation WHERE provider_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT provider_name, contact_information FROM ProviderInformation WHERE provider_id=1;
SELECT * FROM ProviderInformation WHERE industry_standard_rating > 4.5;
SELECT provider_name, location FROM ProviderInformation WHERE industry_standard_rating < 3 OR industry_standard_rating > 4;
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM ProviderInformation ORDER BY provider_name DESC;
SELECT provider_name, industry_standard_rating FROM ProviderInformation WHERE location='New York' ORDER BY industry_standard_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM ProviderInformation;
SELECT name, address FROM ProviderInformation ORDER BY provider_id DESC;
SELECT provider_id, name, phone_number FROM ProviderInformation WHERE industry_standard = 'Healthcare';
SELECT name, provider_id, industry_standard FROM ProviderInformation WHERE provider_id > 100;
SELECT * FROM FraudulentActivities WHERE detection_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM ProviderInformation WHERE provider_id = 1;
SELECT name, address FROM ProviderInformation WHERE industry_standard = 'Healthcare';
SELECT * FROM ProviderInformation ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT name, address, phone_number FROM ProviderInformation WHERE provider_id IN (2, 4);
SELECT provider_id, MAX(phone_number) AS max_phone FROM ProviderInformation GROUP BY provider_id;
SELECT * FROM ProviderInfo;
SELECT provider_name, provider_address FROM ProviderInfo;
SELECT * FROM IndustryStandards WHERE standard_id = 1;
SELECT standard_id, standard_name, standard_description FROM IndustryStandards;
SELECT provider_name, provider_contact FROM ProviderInfo WHERE provider_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM ProviderInfo WHERE provider_id = 1;
SELECT provider_name, provider_address FROM ProviderInfo WHERE provider_address LIKE '%Street%';

SELECT provider_id, provider_name, standard_name FROM ProviderInfo INNER JOIN FraudulentActivities ON ProviderInfo.provider_id = FraudulentActivities.provider_id INNER JOIN IndustryStandards ON FraudulentActivities.standard_id = IndustryStandards.standard_id;
SELECT * FROM FraudulentActivities WHERE activity_date > '2022-01-01';

SELECT standard_name, COUNT(*) AS total_activities FROM IndustryStandards INNER JOIN FraudulentActivities ON IndustryStandards.standard_id = FraudulentActivities.standard_id GROUP BY standard_name ORDER BY total_activities DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM provider_information;
SELECT provider_name, provider_location FROM provider_information;
SELECT provider_name, industry_standard_rating FROM provider_information ORDER BY provider_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM fraudulent_activities WHERE activity_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT provider_id, standard_id, deviation_score FROM comparison_results WHERE deviation_score > 5 ORDER BY provider_id ASC, deviation_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM provider_information ORDER BY provider_name ASC, provider_location DESC;
SELECT provider_id, provider_name FROM provider_information WHERE industry_standard_rating > 3 ORDER BY industry_standard_rating ASC;
SELECT p.provider_name, f.activity_description FROM provider_information p JOIN fraudulent_activities f ON p.provider_id = f.provider_id WHERE DATE(f.activity_timestamp) = CURDATE();

SELECT p.provider_name, i.industry_name, c.deviation_score FROM provider_information p JOIN comparison_results c ON p.provider_id = c.provider_id JOIN industry_standards i ON c.standard_id = i.standard_id WHERE c.deviation_score > 10 ORDER BY c.deviation_score DESC;

SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_fraudulent_activities, AVG(c.deviation_score) AS avg_deviation_score FROM fraudulent_activities f JOIN comparison_results c ON f.provider_id = c.provider_id WHERE f.activity_timestamp > DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 30 DAY);
SELECT * FROM ProviderInfo;
SELECT provider_id, provider_name, provider_location FROM ProviderInfo WHERE provider_type = 'Medical';
SELECT standard_name, standard_category FROM IndustryStandards ORDER BY standard_category DESC;
SELECT activity_type, activity_date FROM FraudulentActivities WHERE activity_type = 'Scam' ORDER BY activity_date DESC;
SELECT provider_name, standard_name, comparison_result FROM ProviderComparison WHERE comparison_result = 'Match';
SELECT * FROM ProviderInfo;
SELECT provider_name, provider_location FROM ProviderInfo WHERE provider_type = 'Medical';
SELECT * FROM IndustryStandards WHERE standard_category = 'Finance' ORDER BY standard_name DESC;

SELECT provider_name, standard_name, comparison_result FROM ProviderInfo JOIN ProviderComparison ON ProviderInfo.provider_id = ProviderComparison.provider_id WHERE ProviderComparison.comparison_result = 'Pass';
SELECT * FROM DetectedFraud WHERE fraud_description LIKE '%fraud%' AND detected_date > '2022-01-01';
